list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: diminish or destroy the value or quality of.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I wouldn't want to spoil your fun
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi sẽ không muốn làm hỏng niềm vui của bạn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: harm the character of (someone, especially a child) by being too lenient or indulgent.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the last thing I want to do is spoil Thomas
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Điều cuối cùng tôi muốn làm là làm hỏng Thomas

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: be extremely or aggressively eager for.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Cooper was spoiling for a fight
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cooper đã làm hỏng một cuộc chiến

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: rob (a person or a place) of goods or possessions by force or violence.
goods stolen or taken forcibly from a person or place.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the looters carried their spoils away
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: những kẻ cướp bóc mang theo chiến lợi phẩm của họ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: waste material brought up during the course of an excavation or a dredging or mining operation.
